doc.after: A planned or constructed language known colloquially or informally as a conlang is a language whose phonology grammar and or vocabulary have been consciously devised by an individual or group instead of having evolved naturally There are many possible reasons to create a constructed language to ease human communication see international auxiliary language and code to bring fiction or an associated constructed world to life linguistic experimentation artistic creation and language games
